snippet: The South American football federation suspended Neymar for four games for his part in a fracas after Brazil’s loss to Colombia two days earlier.
abstract: South American football federation Conmebol fines Brazilian striker Neymar and bars him from remainder of Copa America for his part in altercation during match against Colombia.
lead_paragraph: The South American football federation suspended Neymar for four games for his part in a fracas after Brazil’s loss to Colombia two days earlier.

headline.main: Neymar Is Barred for the Rest of the Copa América
headline.print_headline: Neymar Is Barred for the Rest of the Copa América
